website_summaries.verdict: A solid, durable set of throw pillows versatile enough to be used indoors or outdoors. Users report these pillows wear well over time.
pros: Stylish design, durable construction, and good stain and water-resistance
Consumers love the vibrant patterns, ample stuffing, and the fact that they are reversible
cons: Some owners complain of issues with unraveling stitches

customer_reviews.title: Stitching unravels.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful pattern, nicely stuffed, not too firm. Only 3 stars because the seams are opening everywhere. I cannot return them and cannot contact the company (no contact email or phone). It happened to all the cushions, all different sizes, I ordered from this company. Super expensive so I am not happy about having to find someone to stitch them for me, especially since they are outdoor cushions, it requires more expensive thread. UPDATE: After 3 years the colour faded noticeably and now after 5 years they are garbage. So sad they didn't last longer.
customer_reviews.author: Shell-the-Belle

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful addition to beige patio furniture!
customer_reviews.text: We've only had these about a week, so I can't comment yet on how they hold up, but they are beautiful and we are very pleased with them. The only problem we've had is deciding which side to show - the stripes or the flowers since both are great!
customer_reviews.author: Johnny

customer_reviews.title: A Nice Colorful Touch
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for pillows to dress up a brown wooden bench patio glider and these caught my eye. I just love them. The colors are as pictured and very pretty in person. The pillows seem properly stitched. I try to take them in if I know there is going to be rainy weather, but you know how that goes! They have gotten wet and have dried quickly. I would recommend these if they appeal to you.
customer_reviews.author: Beatrice Benesh

customer_reviews.title: Great quality. Colors nice and bright
customer_reviews.text: This is a follow-up to my original review. I get a lot of strong winds on my patio and last night winds were 25 mph+ and the cushions were still in place. I can't say the same for a couple other ottoman cushions that were not strapped on Last years comments--Great quality. Colors nice and bright. It gives the patio area a real nice Southwest flavor.
customer_reviews.author: GKP

customer_reviews.title: Love them but...
customer_reviews.text: Although I thought these beautiful pillows were a bit overpriced I needed them to complete my set. Otherwise, the color is vibrant and rich and the cushions are thick and well made. Love them!
customer_reviews.author: Ebony EyeCU Reading

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty in a color-popping yet neutral sort of way
customer_reviews.text: They are nice and full and use them as the back cushions of my outdoor wooden seat in my screened-in porch. They coordinate so well with the matching loveseat cushion! Colorful and vibrant but not in a ridiculous sort of way; just a really nice set!
customer_reviews.author: Donna Glusic

customer_reviews.title: Hard hard pillow
customer_reviews.text: Cute pattern. Hard as a rock. If you just want a pop of color this is great. If your also wishing to use the pillow, I do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Momma Ro

customer_reviews.title: These are the perfect pillows
customer_reviews.text: We purchased a patio set last year. I've been unsuccessful finding toss pillows for this patio set because the orange seat cushion didn't match the bright orange pillows that is in trend right now. Visited Amazon.com & literally found the perfect outdoor pillows.
customer_reviews.author: F. Rice

customer_reviews.title: Great pillows
customer_reviews.text: These are beautiful and much larger than I expected (guess I didn't pay attention to the dimensions when I ordered them lol)! I got them with the lumbar pillows to dress up my outdoor chairs and love seat. They were so beautiful I also ordered the chaise pads!
customer_reviews.author: Karen R.

customer_reviews.title: You won't be disappointed
customer_reviews.text: One of my best Amazon purchases ever...awesome quality, firm, brilliant colors and very comfortable.

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware
customer_reviews.text: Looks great. Fabric is very stiff and slippery, Pillows constantly slipping and seat cushion slides off center. I would not recommend or buy again. I buy a new set every one or two years . This is by far the worst I have ever had.

customer_reviews.title: nice pillows and at a very good price!
customer_reviews.text: Love the color and the size of the pillows! Excellent quality! Came faster than expected and fit our outdoor furniture well.

customer_reviews.title: DIdn't fit our chairs well.
customer_reviews.text: I returned the pillows are they were not quite as big as advertised and they were too thick for our chairs.
customer_reviews.author: Judith M. Darnell

customer_reviews.title: Overfilled
customer_reviews.text: Toss pillows in my opinion, especially outdoor cushions should be plump but not overfilled to the point they are uncomfortable. The fabric is gorgeous, the pattern is fantastic and the colors are crisp and bright. I purchased squares and rectangular pillows. All are reversible - stripes and floral. Just wish either fabric is softer or the pillows less full.
customer_reviews.author: SE_Gardener

customer_reviews.title: Great compliment to the matching chair cushions
customer_reviews.text: These were the icing on the cake! I ordered chair pad that are the same stripes as these pillows. They look awesome together!

customer_reviews.title: Quality fabric and workmanship.
customer_reviews.text: We chose these to go on top of turquoise cushions around the fire pit. They are very well-made and love that we can reverse the design. One star off for comfort only because they are so heavily stuffed, making them almost too fat! Delivered quickly with Prime.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Shriner

customer_reviews.title: patio pillows
customer_reviews.text: purchased this set earlier this month and liked them so much I purchased another set. they are 2 sided so you can mix and match. the color scheme is awesome....can be used in so many different variables. good quality also.

Cannot speak for how well they may or may not fade due to weather since they are new but they compliment many different colors. I added some bigger clay pillows to these and WOW, my porch is popping!

product_meta.title: Pillow Perfect Indoor/Outdoor Annie Westport Reversible Corded Throw Pillow, 18.5-Inch, Chocolate, Set of 2
product_meta.description: Add the perfect blend of color and comfort to any space in your home with this set of two square corded throw pillows from the Pillow Perfect Annie Westport Reversible Collection. Dimensions: 18.5 in. L X 18.5 in. W X 5 in. D.
feature_bullets: Made in the USA or Imported
Includes two (2) outdoor pillows, resists weather and fading in sunlight; Suitable for indoor and outdoor use
Edges of outdoor pillows are trimmed with matching fabric and cord to sit perfectly on your outdoor patio furniture
Easy Care - lightly spot clean or hand wash outdoor pillow fabric with mild detergent and cool water; then let air dry
Measures: 18.5-inch length X 18.5-inch width X 5-inch depth (measurements may vary up to 1-inch since item is handcrafted)

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
